name: Brand Design Toolbox
description: The all-in-one Notion system to build brands with clarity, speed, and confidence.Designing a brand is complex. Your process doesn’t have to be.Brand Design Toolbox gives you a ready-made framework to take every project from first call to final launch—without the overwhelm.✅ 70 essential templates covering every stage of brand design✅ A proven structure so nothing falls through the cracks✅ A reusable system you can run with every client, every timeFrom start to finish, it keeps you on track Disco
features: Discovery & Research: capture audience, competitor, and market insights; Strategy: define positioning, values, and messaging with clarity; Concept Development: explore and present creative directions confidently; Execution: keep logos, colors, and typography organized and on-brand; Guidelines: package assets into polished documentation; Rollout: plan launches and campaigns smoothly; Evaluation: track brand health and adapt with data; Professional polish: impress clients with a clear, structured process; Faster delivery: skip repetitive setup and dive straight into creativity; Repeatable results: one toolkit that works for every brand you build
